dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset provides high-quality semantic segmentation annotations with 3900 and 880 images for training and testing respectively, annotated at 20 frames per second from 50 different cities. It is commonly used as the data source for autonomous driving computer vision tasks and state-of-the-art deep learning models.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes dataset (CS)

dcterms:creator: Cory Cornelius
Shang-Tse Chen
Jason Martin
Duen Horng Chau
dcterms:description: The CARLA simulator dataset is used to construct a synthetic dataset that includes RGB image data and ground truth semantic segmentation maps from 5 different towns with dynamic weather conditions and realistic graphical settings. It is designed to evaluate model performance under diverse environmental conditions.
dcterms:title: CARLA simulator dataset (CL)
